sense.def:
Writing
je nekaj, kar je bilo napisano ali natisnjeno.

seg.quote: Put the papers face down so that the writing cannot be seen.
You must get the offer in writing.

sense.def:
Vsako napisano delo lahko imenujemo
writing
, zlasti kadar mislimo na jezikovni slog, uporabljen v njem.

Writing
je tudi dejavnost pisanja, predvsem pisanja knjig za denar.

seg.quote: I hate writing and I'm not very good at it.

sense.def:
An author's writings
je vse, kar je napisal tisti pisatelj.

seg.quote: His political writings remind me of those of Sartre.
